Node.definition: = a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: (one's) heart is established
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
literally: glory; hence: = the inner person of a human being ◄ as the glory and pride of that individual
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a soundbox made of wood with strings of animal intestines stretched over the top, parallel to the soundbox

= musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing
= causative action by which someone wakes up someone else from his sleep
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
read בַּל־אֻמִּים as בַּלאֻמִּים among the nations
= a large body of people united by common descent
= state in which an event has a high intensity

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

literally: to be, become high; hence: = processs by which humans or deities acquire an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
a more or less fixed phrase: the heavens and the earth, equivalent to a single lexical item: the totality of God's creation
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority
= causative action by which deities bring humans out of a dangerous situation
= person of either sex, with whom someone has, or has had, a close, affectionate relationship
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= causative action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► assigned to clan of Kohath (קֳהָת) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) as a town of refuge
= town; ◄ territory of Gad (גָּד)
literally: to measure off; hence: = action by which deities divide an object into portions in order to share them out among different parties
= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: fortification for the head; hence: = head covering; ◄ made of metal; ► used by soldiers for protection

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= object shaped in such a way that it can be held in one's hand; ◄ usually made out of wood and/or metal; ► held by people in authority, like kings; ≈ symbolizes the position of authority of the person holding it
= a nation and its territory; ◄ situated E. of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) regarded as founded by a son of Lot (לֹוט)
= a rounded container ◄ usually made of ceramic or metal ► used for storage or cooking
= basin used for washing
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
= a covering for the foot ◄ usually made of leather or wood ► either open and laced around the foot or ankle with a strap, or closed around the foot like a shoe

= land of the Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) situated along the coast of the Meditteranean and concentrated around the cities of Gaza (עַזָּה) Gath (גַּת) Ekron (עֶקְרֹון) Ashdod (אַשְׁדֹּוד) and Ashkelon (אַשְׁקְלֹון)

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or inanimate objects to move or be moved from one place to another

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= population center that has been fortified with the help of a strong and solid wall and possibly other defense works; ≈ associated with security

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which someone makes a conscious decision to dismiss a certain object, person, or deity as inadequate, faulty, or otherwise unacceptable
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey

Node.gloss: to grant help|to give aid|to help
Node.definition: literally: to give; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to receive a quality, a position, or support
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= state in which objects or activities do not serve a valid purpose and can only lead to disappointment
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the rescue of humans in need
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

literally: to do substantially; hence: = action as a result of which humans or deities are deemed worthy of respect, because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans tread heavily and noisily on somebody or something; ► usually with the purpose of killing, destroying, desecrating, and/or humiliating
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
